default: (a) una {@item spear|phb} o bé (b) una {@item mace|phb}
(a) {@item armadura de cuir|phb} o bé (b) {@item studded leather armor|phb}
(a) una {@item ballesta lleugera|phb} i {@item crossbow bolts (20)|phb|20 bolts} o bé (b) qualsevol {@filter simple weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon}
(a) una {@item scholar's pack|phb} o bé (b) an {@item pack d'exploració|phb}

fluff.name: Místic
entries: A human clad in simple robes walks along a forest path. A gang of goblins emerges from the brush, arrows trained on him, their smiles wide at their good fortune of finding such easy prey for the legion's slave pens. Their smiles turn to shrieks of terror as the traveler grows to giant size and leaps at them, his staff now a deadly cudgel.

The militia forms in ranks to prepare for the orcs' charge. The growling brutes howl their battle cries and surge forward. To their surprise, the human rabble holds its ground and fights with surprising ferocity. Suddenly, mindless fear clings to the orcs' minds and they, despite facing a far inferior foe, turn and run, never noticing the calm half-elf standing amid the militia and directing its efforts.

Baron von Ludwig was always proud of his grand library. Little did he know that each evening, a gnome laden with blank scrolls slipped past his guards each night and dutifully copied his most heavily guarded archives. When the duke's men arrived to arrest him for dealing with demons, he never guessed that the gnome scribe traveling with them had spent more time in his keep than he had over the past year.

These heroes are all mystics, followers of a strange and mysterious form of power. Mystics shun the world to turn their eyes inward, mastering the full potential of their minds and exploring their psyches before turning to face the world. Mystics are incredibly rare, and most prefer to keep the nature of their abilities secret. Using their inner, psychic strength, they can read minds, fade into invisibility, transform their bodies into living iron, and seize control of the physical world and bend it to their will.

entries.name: Hermits and Outcasts
entries: Mystics are loners. Most discover the secrets of their power through vague references in tomes of lore or by ingratiating themselves to a master of the power.

In order to master their power, mystics must first master themselves. They spend months and years in quiet contemplation, exploring their minds and leaving nothing uncovered. During this time, they shun society and typically live as hermits at the edge of society. A mystic who studied under a master worked as a virtual slave, toiling away at mundane tasks in return for the occasional lesson or cryptic insight.

When mystics finally master their power, they return to the world to broaden their horizons and practice their craft. Some mystics prefer to remain isolated, but those who become adventurers aren't content to remain on the fringe of the world.

entries.name: Eccentric Minds
entries: In order to maintain the strict discipline and intense self-knowledge needed to tap into their power, mystics develop a variety of practices to keep their focus sharp.

These practices are reflected in taboos and quirks, strange little behaviors that govern a mystic's actions. These quirks are oaths or behavioral tics that help keep mystics in the proper frame of mind while maintaining perfect control over their minds and bodies.

While these taboos are harmless, they help cast mystics as outsiders. Few feel accepted by society, and fewer still care to become integrated with it. To mystics, the life of the mind is where they feel most at home.

entries.name: Selecting Quirks
entries: To add some texture to your mystic, consider the quirks your character has acquired. These behaviors have no game effect, but your character might become irritated or upset if forced to break them. They're a great roleplaying tool to add character to the game. You can roll on or pick from the table below, or create your own quirks. Aim to create two quirks, to give them more of a chance to come into play. Finally, consider why your character chose these behaviors. What do they say about your character's personality or background? Are they based on a specific incident or a belief?

entries.caption: Mystic Quirks
rows: You never cut your hair.
You refuse to wear clothes of a specific color.
You never say your name.
You never wear footwear.
You always wear a mask.
You dye your hair bright blue or green.
You pick a new name each day.
You never immerse yourself in water.
You sleep on bare earth.
You never consume alcohol.
You wear a veil to conceal your face.
You always wear a specific piece of clothing.
You refuse to light fires.
You refuse to write things down, instead using pictograms.
You never sit on a chair, preferring to stand or sit on the floor.
You never answer to any name but your own.
You write down the name of tota criatura you slay, and name ones that are unnamed.
You consume only water and raw vegetables.
You spend any money you earn within 1 week of gaining it.
You often speak to an imaginary companion, and act only with its blessing.

entries.name: Creating a Místic
entries: When creating a mystic, consider your character's background. How did you become a mystic? What first drew you to this practice? Are you self-taught, or did you have a master? If you had a master, what is that relationship like?
Consider also why you returned to the world from your hermitage. Did you leave someone or something behind when you took up your studies? Are you driven by revenge or some other motivation?

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a mystic quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Intel·ligència your highest ability score, followed by Destresa or Constitució. Second, choose the {@background hermit} background.

subclass.name: Order of the Soul Knife
subclassFeatures: Order of the Soul Knife|Místic|UATheMysticClass|Soul Knife|UATheMysticClass|1

subclass.name: Order of the Wu Jen
subclassFeatures: Order of the Wu Jen|Místic|UATheMysticClass|Wu Jen|UATheMysticClass|1

classFeature.name: Ordre Mística
entries: A nivell 1, esculls una Ordre Mística de la llista de orders disponibles Each order specializes in a specific approach to psionics.
Your order gives you features when you choose it a nivell 1 and additional features at 3rd, 6th, and 14th level.

classFeature.name: Psionic Disciplines and Talents
entries: Talent Psiònics and disciplines are the heart of a mystic's craft. They are the mental exercises and psionic formulae used to forge will into tangible, magical effects.
Psionic disciplines were each discovered by different orders and tend to reflect their creators' specialties. However, a mystic can learn any discipline regardless of its associated order.

classFeature.name: Psionics
entries: As a student of psionics, you can master and use Talent Psiònics and disciplines, the rules for which appear at the end of this document. Psionics is a special form of magic use, distinct from spellcasting.

entries.name: Talent Psiònics
entries: A Talent Psiònic is a minor psionic effect you have mastered. A nivell 1, you know one Talent Psiònic (escull). You learn additional talents (escull) at higher levels. The Talents Known column of the Mystic table shows the total number of talents you know at each level; when that number goes up for you, choose a new talent.

entries.name: Psionic Disciplines
entries: A psionic discipline is a rigid set of mental exercises that allows a mystic to manifest poder psiònic. A mystic masters only a few disciplines at a time.

A nivell 1, you know one psionic discipline (escull). The Disciplines Known column of the Mystic table shows the total number of disciplines you know at each level; when that number goes up for you, choose a new discipline.
A més, whenever you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace one discipline you know with a different one (escull).

entries.name: Psi Points
entries: You have an internal reservoir of energy that can be devoted to psionic disciplines you know. This energy is represented by psi points. Each psionic discipline describes effects you can create with it by spending a certain number of psi points. A Talent Psiònic requires no psi points.

The number of psi points you have is based on your mystic level, as shown in the Psi Points column of the Mystic table. The number shown for your level is your psi point maximum. Your psi point total returns to its maximum quan acabis un Descans Llarg. The number of psi points you have can't go below 0 or over your maximum.

entries.name: Psi Limit
entries: Though you have access to a potent amount of psionic energy, it takes training and practice to channel that energy. There is a limit on the number of psi points you can spend to activate a psionic discipline. The limit is based on your mystic level, as shown in the Psi Limit column of the Mystic table. For example, as a 3rd-level mystic, you can spend no more than 3 psi points on a discipline each time you use it, no matter how many psi points you have.

entries.name: Psychic Focus
entries: You can focus psionic energy on one of your psionic disciplines to draw ongoing benefits from it. Com a acció bonus, you can choose one of your psionic disciplines and gain its psychic focus benefit, which is detailed in that discipline's description. The benefit lasts until you are {@condition incapacitated} or until you use another bonus action to choose a different focus benefit.
You can have only one psychic focus benefit at a time, and using the psychic focus of one discipline doesn't limit your ability to use other disciplines.

entries.name: Psionic Ability
entries: Intel·ligència is your psionic ability for your psionic disciplines. You use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència when setting the saving throw DC for a psionic discipline or when making an attack roll with one.

classFeature.name: Using a Discipline
entries: Each psionic discipline has several ways you can use it, all contained in its description. The discipline specifies the type of action and number of psi points it requires. It also details whether you must concentrate on its effects, how many targets it affects, what saving throws it requires, and so on.
The following sections go into more detail on using a discipline. Psionic disciplines are magical and function similarly to spells.

entries.name: Psychic Focus
entries: The Psychic Focus section of a discipline describes the benefit you gain when you choose that discipline for your psychic focus.

entries.name: Effect Options and Psi Points
entries: A discipline provides different options for how to use it with your psi points. Each effect option has a name, and the psi point cost of that option appears in parentheses after its name. You must spend that number of psi points to use that option, while abiding by your psi limit. If you don't have enough psi points left, or the cost is above your psi limit, you can't use the option.

Some options show a range of psi points, rather than a specific cost. To use that option, you must spend a number of points within that point range, still abiding by your psi limit. Some options let you spend additional psi points to increase a discipline's potency. Again, you must abide by your psi limit, and you must spend all the points when you first use the discipline; you can't decide to spend additional points once you see the discipline in action.
Each option notes specific information about its effect, including any action required to use it and its range.

entries.name: Components
entries: Disciplines don't require the components that many spells require. Using a discipline requires no spoken words, gestures, or materials. The power of psionics comes from the mind.

entries.name: Duration
entries: An effect option in a discipline specifies how long its effect lasts.

entries.name: Instantaneous
entries: If no duration is specified, the effect of the option is instantaneous.

entries.name: Concentration
entries: Some options require concentration to maintain their effects. This requirement is noted with "conc." after the option's psi point cost. The "conc." notation is followed by the maximum duration of the concentration. For example, if an option says "conc., 1 min.," you can concentrate on its effect for up to 1 minute.

Concentrating on a discipline follows the same rules as concentrating on a spell. This rule means you can't concentrate on a spell and a discipline at the same time, nor can you concentrate on two disciplines at the same time. See {@book capítol 10|PHB|10}, "Spellcasting," in the Player's Handbook for how concentration works.

entries.name: Targets and Areas of Effect
entries: Psionic disciplines use the same rules as spells for determining targets and areas of effect, as presented in {@book capítol 10|PHB|10}, "Spellcasting," of the Player's Handbook.

entries.name: Saving Throws and Attack Rolls
entries: If a discipline requires a saving throw, it specifies the type of save and the results of a successful or failed saving throw. The DC is determined by your psionic ability.
Some disciplines require you to make an attack roll to determine whether the discipline's effect hits its target. The attack roll uses your psionic ability.

entries.name: Combining Psionic Effects
entries: The effects of different psionic disciplines add together while the durations of the disciplines overlap. Likewise, different options from a psionic discipline combine if they are active at the same time. However, a specific option from a psionic discipline doesn't combine with itself if the option is used multiple times. Instead, the most potent effect—usually dependent on how many psi points were used to create the effect—applies while the durations of the effects overlap.
Psionics and spells are separate effects, and therefore their benefits and drawbacks overlap. A psionic effect that reproduces a spell is an exception to this rule.

classFeature.name: Mystical Recovery
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you can draw vigor from the psi energy you use to power your psionic disciplines.
Immediatament after you spend psi points on a psionic discipline, you can take a bonus action to regain hit points equal to the number of psi points you spent.

classFeature.name: Telepathy
entries: A nivell 2, your mind awakens to the ability to communicate via telepathy. You can telepathically speak to any creature que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu in this manner. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathic messages, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language or be telepathic itself.

classFeature.name: Ordre Mística feature
entries: A nivell 3, you gain another feature from your Ordre Mística.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, i de nou als nivells 8, 12, 16, i 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Força of Mind
entries: Even the simplest psionic technique requires a deep understanding of how psionic energy can augment mind and body. This understanding allows you to alter your defenses to better deal with threats.

Començant a nivell 4, you can replace your proficiency in Saviesa saving throws quan acabis un descans curt o llarg. To do so, choose Força, Destresa, Constitució, or Carisma. You gain proficiency in saves using that ability, instead of Saviesa. This change lasts fins que acabis el teu proper Descans Curt o Llarg.

classFeature.name: Ordre Mística feature
entries: A nivell 6, you gain another feature from your Ordre Mística.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, i de nou als nivells 8, 12, 16, i 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Potent Psionics (1d8)
entries: A nivell 8, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon attacks with psychic energy. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura with a weapon, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic to that target. Quan arribes a nivell 14, this extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.
A més, you add el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència to any damage roll you make for a Talent Psiònic.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 8 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Consumptive Power
entries: A nivell 10, you gain the ability to sacrifice your physical durability in exchange for poder psiònic. When activating a psionic discipline, you can pay its psi point cost with your hit points, instead of using any psi points. Your current hit points and punts de vida màxims are both reduced by the number of hit points you spend. This reduction can't be lessened in any way, and the reduction to els teus punts de vida màxims lasts fins que acabis un descans llarg.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Psionic Mastery (1/Day)
entries: Començant a nivell 11, your mastery of psionic energy allows you to push your mind beyond its normal limits. Com a acció, you gain 9 special psi points that you can spend only on disciplines that require an action or a bonus action to use. You can use all 9 points on one discipline, or you can spread them across multiple disciplines. You can't also spend your normal psi points on these disciplines; you can spend only the special points gained from this feature. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you lose any of these special points that you haven't spent.

If more than one of the disciplines you activate with these points require concentration, you can concentrate on all of them. Activating one of them ends any effect you were already concentrating on, and if you begin concentrating on an effect that doesn't use these special points, the disciplines end that you're concentrating on.
A nivell 15, the pool of psi points you gain from this feature increases to 11.
You have one use of this feature, and you regain any expended use of it with a long rest. You gain one additional use of this feature at 13th, 15th, and 17th level.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, i de nou als nivells 8, 12, 16, i 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 12 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Psionic Mastery (2/Day)
entries: A nivell 13, you can use your Psionic Mastery twice per day.

classFeature.name: Ordre Mística feature
entries: A nivell 14, you gain another feature from your Ordre Mística.

classFeature.name: Potent Psionics (2d8)
entries: A nivell 14, your potent psionics damage increased to {@dice 2d8}.

classFeature.name: Psionic Mastery (3/Day)
entries: A nivell 15, you can use your Psionic Mastery three times per day.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, i de nou als nivells 8, 12, 16, i 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 16 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Psionic Mastery (4/Day)
entries: A nivell 17, you can use your Psionic Mastery four times per day.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, i de nou als nivells 8, 12, 16, i 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Psionic Body
entries: A nivell 20, your mastery of poder psiònic causes your mind to transcend the body. Your physical form is infused with psionic energy. Reps els beneficis següents:

items: You gain resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant.
You are immune to disease, poison damage, and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

If you die, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 10 or higher, you discorporate with 0 punts de vida, instead of dying, and you fall {@condition unconscious}. You and your gear disappear. You appear at a spot (escull) {@dice 1d3} days later on the plane of existence where you died, having gained the benefits of one long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Order of the Avatar
entries: Mystics of the Order of the Avatar delve into the world of emotion, mastering their inner life to such an extent that they can manipulate and amplify the emotions of others with the same ease that an artist shapes clay. Known as Avatars, these mystics vary from tyrants to inspiring leaders who are loved by their followers.

Avatars can bring out extreme emotions in the people around them. For their allies, they can lend hope, ferocity, and courage, transforming a fighting band into a deadly, unified force. For their enemies, they bring fear, disgust, and trepidation that can make even the most hardened veteran act like a shaky rookie.

subclassFeature.name: Armor Training
entries: A nivell 1, reps competència amb armadures intermitges and shields.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Disciplines
entries: A nivell 1, you learn two additional psionic disciplines (escull). They must be chosen from among the Avatar disciplines.

subclassFeature.name: Avatar of Battle
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you project an inspiring aura. While you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, each ally a 30 peus de tu who can see you gains a +2 bonus to initiative rolls.

subclassFeature.name: Avatar of Healing
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you project an aura of resilience. While you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, each ally a 30 peus de tu who can see you regains additional hit points equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de 0) whenever they regain hit points from a psionic discipline.

subclassFeature.name: Avatar of Speed
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you project an aura of speed. While you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, any ally a 30 peus de tu who can see pots, com a acció bonus, prendre l'acció {@action Dash}.

subclassFeature.name: Order of the Awakened
entries: Mystics dedicated to the Order of the Awakened seek to unlock the full potential of the mind. By transcending the physical, the Awakened hope to attain a state of being focused on pure intellect and mental energy.

The Awakened are skilled at bending minds and unleashing devastating psionic attacks, and they can read the secrets of the world through psionic energy. Awakened mystics who take to adventuring excel at unraveling mysteries, solving puzzles, and defeating monsters by turning them into unwilling pawns.

subclassFeature.name: Awakened Talent
entries: A nivell 1, you gain proficiency with two of the following skills (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Deception}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Perception}, i {@skill Persuasion}.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Disciplines
entries: A nivell 1, you learn two additional psionic disciplines (escull). They must be chosen from among the Awakened disciplines.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Investigation
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you can focus your mind to read the psionic imprint left on an object. If you hold an object and concentrate on it durant 10 minuts (as if concentrating on a psionic discipline), you learn a few basic facts about it. You gain a mental image from the object's point of view, showing the last creature to hold the object within the past 24 hours.

You also learn of any events that have occurred within 20 feet of the object within the past hour. The events you perceive unfold from the object's perspective. You see and hear such events as if you were there, but can't use other senses.

A més, you can embed an intangible psionic sensor within the object. Durant les properes 24 hores, you can use an action to learn the object's location relative to you (its distance and direction) and to look at the object's surroundings from its point of view as if you were there. This perception lasts fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Surge
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you can overload your psychic focus to batter down an opponent's defenses. You can impose disadvantage on a target's saving throw against a discipline or talent you use, but at the cost of using your psychic focus. Your psychic focus immediately ends if it's active, and you can't use it fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
You can't use this feature if you can't use your psychic focus.

subclassFeature.name: Spectral Form
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to become a ghostly figure of psionic energy. Com a acció, you can transform into a transparent, ghostly version of yourself. While in this form, tens resistència a tot tipus de dany, move at half speed, and can pass through objects and creatures while moving but can't willingly end your movement in their spaces. The form dura 10 minuts or until you use an action to end it.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Order of the Immortal
entries: The Order of the Immortal uses psionic energy to augment and modify the physical form. Followers of this order are known as Immortals. They use psionic energy to modify their bodies, strengthening them against attack and turning themselves into living weapons.
Their mastery of the physical form grants them their name, for Immortals are notoriously difficult to kill.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Disciplines
entries: A nivell 1, you learn two additional psionic disciplines (escull). They must be chosen from among the Immortal disciplines.

subclassFeature.name: Immortal Durability
entries: Començant a nivell 1, els teus punts de vida màxims increases by 1 per mystic level.
A més, while you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield, your base AC equals 10 + el teu modificador de Destresa + el teu modificador de Constitució.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Resilience
entries: Començant a nivell 3, your psionic energy grants you extraordinary fortitude. At the start of each of your turns, you gain punts de vida temporals equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de 0) if you have at least 1 hit point.

subclassFeature.name: Surge of Health
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you can draw on your psychic focus to escape death's grasp. Com a reacció when you take damage, you can halve that damage against you. Your psychic focus immediately ends if it's active, and you can't use it fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
You can't use this feature if you can't use your psychic focus.

subclassFeature.name: Immortal Will
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can draw on your reserves of poder psiònic to survive beyond death. At the end of your turn while at 0 punts de vida, you can spend 5 psi points to immediately regain a number of hit points equal to your mystic level + el teu modificador de Constitució.

subclassFeature.name: Order of the Nomad
entries: Mystics of the Order of the Nomad keep their minds in a strange, rarified state. They seek to accumulate as much knowledge as possible, as they quest to unravel the mysteries of the multiverse and seek the underlying structure of all things. At the same time, they perceive a bizarre, living web of knowledge they call the noosphere.

Nomads, as their name indicates, delight in travel, exploration, and discovery. They desire to accumulate as much knowledge as possible, and the pursuit of secrets and hidden lore can become an obsession for them.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Disciplines
entries: A nivell 1, you learn two additional psionic disciplines (escull). They must be chosen from among the Nomad disciplines.

subclassFeature.name: Breadth of Knowledge
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to extend your knowledge. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you gain two proficiencies (escull): two tools, two skills, or one of each. You can replace one or both of these selections with languages. This benefit lasts fins que acabis un descans llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Memory of One Thousand Steps
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to use psionics to recall your steps. Com a reacció when you are hit by an attack, you can teleport en un espai desocupat that you occupied since the start of your last turn, and the attack misses you. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Superior Teleportation
entries: A nivell 6, you gain a superior talent for teleportation. When you use a psionic discipline to teleport any distance, you can increase that distance by fins a 10 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Effortless Journey
entries: Començant a nivell 14, your mind can mystically move your body. Un cop a cada torn teu, you can forfeit fins a 30 peus of your movement to teleport the distance you forfeited. You must teleport en un espai desocupat que puguis veure.

subclassFeature.name: Order of the Soul Knife
entries: The Order of the Soul Knife sacrifices the breadth of knowledge other mystics gain to focus on a specific psionic technique. These mystics learn to manifest a deadly weapon of pure psychic energy that they can use to cleave through foes.
Soul knives vary widely in their approach to this path. Some follow it out of a desire to achieve martial perfection. Others are ruthless assassins who seek to become the perfect killer.

subclassFeature.name: Martial Training
entries: A nivell 1, reps competència amb armadures intermitges and martial weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Soul Knife
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you gain the ability to manifest a blade of psychic energy. Com a acció bonus, you create scintillating knives of energy that project from both of your fists. You can't hold anything in your hands while manifesting these blades. You can dismiss them com a acció bonus.
For you, a soul knife is a martial melee weapon with the light and finesse properties. It deals {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic on a hit.
Com a acció bonus, you can prepare to use the blades to parry; tens +2 a la CA fins l'inici del teu proper torn or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.

subclassFeature.name: Hone the Blade
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you can spend psi points to augment your soul knife's attack rolls and damage. You gain a bonus to attack and damage rolls with your soul knives depending on the number of psi points spent, as shown on the table below. This bonus dura 10 minuts.

subclassFeature.name: Consumptive Knife
entries: Començant a nivell 6, whenever you slay an enemy creature with a soul knife attack, you immediately regain 2 psi points.

subclassFeature.name: Phantom Knife
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can make an attack that phases through most defenses. Com a acció, you can make one attack with your soul knife. Treat the target's AC as 10 against this attack, regardless of the target's actual AC.

subclassFeature.name: Order of the Wu Jen
entries: The Order of the Wu Jen features some of the most devoted mystics. These mystics seek to lock themselves away from the world, denying the limits of the physical world and replacing it with a reality that they create for themselves. Known as wu jens, these mystics cast their minds into the world, seize control of its fundamental principles, and rebuild it.
In practical terms, wu jens excel at controlling the forces of the natural world. They can hurl objects with their minds, control the quatre elements, and alter reality to fit their desires.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Disciplines
entries: A nivell 1, you learn two additional psionic disciplines (escull). They must be chosen from among the Wu Jen disciplines.

subclassFeature.name: Hermit's Study
entries: A nivell 1, you gain proficiency with two of the following skills (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Religion}, or {@skill Survival}.

subclassFeature.name: Harmonització Elemental
entries: Començant a nivell 3, when a creature's resistance reduces the damage dealt by a psionic discipline of yours, you can spend 1 psi point to cause that use of the discipline to ignore the creature's resistance. You can't spend this point if doing so would increase the discipline's cost above your psi limit.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Dabbler
entries: A nivell 6, you learn three wizard spells (escull) and always have them prepared. The spells must be of 1st through 3rd level.

Com a acció bonus, you can spend psi points to create ranures de conjur that you can use to cast these spells, as well as other spells you are capable of casting. The psi-point cost of each spell slot is detailed on the table below.
The spell slot remains until you use it or finish a long rest. You must observe your psi limit when spending psi points to create a spell slot.
Whenever you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace on of the chosen wizard spells with a different wizard spell of 1st through 3rh level.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Mastery
entries: Començant a nivell 14, if you have resistance to a type of damage, you can spend 2 psi points com a reacció when you take damage of that type to ignore that damage; you gain immunity to that damage type fins el final del teu proper torn.
